JobTitle: Strategic Business Development Representative - Uber for Business
JobFullDesc: About the Role:We're looking for an experienced and driven Strategic Business Development Representative to support our Uber for Business Strategic sales team. This high-impact position will provide sales support to Strategic Account Executives through the development of qualified leads that result in achieving our business goals. You will be calling upon our largest, and most strategic client accounts. This role will serve as a training ground for a pathway into an Account Executive position with demonstrated success. You'll be responsible for conducting outbound prospecting campaigns (both call and email). Develop rapport with contacts in an effort to understand where the prospect is in the buying cycle. Work with Strategic Account Executives, to ensure that the leads provided accurately qualified and will progress through the sales funnel.
